synopsis.text: Kazuhiro Kitase is a young man whose main hobby is sleeping. Since childhood, he has had the magical ability to enter a fantastical dream world where he goes on wondrous adventures. Over time, he befriends a female elf in this dream realm. One day, Kazuhiro and the elf girl get caught in a dragon's fiery breath, branding them both. When Kazuhiro awakens, he is shocked to find the elf girl now in the real world, sleeping next to him. It seems the dragon's magical brand has brought to life Kazuhiro's dream companion. With his new elf friend by his side, Kazuhiro faces a future filled with excitement and fun as they explore the modern world together. Their magical connection promises laughs and wonder at every turn.
synopsis.author: anthropic.claude-v2:1
